item.title: HLJenga: Hexalink Jenga Manipulator
item.description: VIDEO DEMO OVERVIEW We were required to program QKM manipulators to play Jenga automatically My part was doing hand-eye calibration, blob analysis, path/trajectory planning and simple UI The robot operates like this: Take a picture with camera and calculate target positions Do path and trajectory planning Upload planned trajectory to bot Run HAND-EYE CALIBRATION HEC Explained in A Nutshell Aims to find the transform matrix from camera frame to tool frame.
